nodes.text: The happy-patty was a type of food available around the year 13 ABY. A favorite among children, the dish could be prepared quickly.

Happy-patties were first mentioned briefly in a metaphor from Planet of Twilight, a 1997 novel by Barbara Hambly, but they were not described. In 2008, they were given an entry in The Complete Star Wars Encyclopedia, which included a sentence of explanation.
